name: Frost, Fire, and Brimstone
description:
As temperatures have continued to rise, it has annoyed the residents of Lab Specter, including Paola, to no end. Unlike the rest of the members, however, Paola has a foolproof plan for making it more bearable: Freezing Hell over.

Take control of Paola and play through 44 unique levels!

Fight various enemies, all with your death on their mind!

Make careful decisions in order to reach the par times for each level!

(By the by, some controls I didn't explain in game:

Escape brings you to a level select menu

"F" Fullscreens the game.)

Enjoy!
